item.description:
Did you miss the 5,000 Member Celebration? Growing a little tired of your old friends? Does the upcoming ‘Holiday Office Party’ fill you with dread? Don’t worry; we’re here to help!

In classic Boston Volunteer style, we’re celebrating another party! Turns out, our last one was such a hit that people asked for more. Guess that’s what happens when you fill the place with such amazing people! Just like last time, we have the entire second floor reserved. There will be complimentary food, drink specials, and a chance to meet and greet some of the coolest folks around.

Pick up a Boston Volunteer T-shirt, bring a friend who you think might like get involved, schmooze with the event organizers, and spend time with some truly great people.

We anticipate celebrating with you!

Josh, Nagina, Phani, Sehily, Imanuela, Corey, Nick, Steph and Elana

 

The Boston Volunteers
Big enough to Deliver, small enough to care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

 

P.P.S. Hundreds of Boston Volunteers will be partying. There will be a special complementary cupcake for you. Who else is coming: http://www.facebook.com/events/394179967319975/

 

P.P.S. Many Boston Volunteers are friending our friend, the popular Paulette.
Who is Paulette: http://www.facebook.com/paulette.revere.7
item.how_to_find_us: We have the whole 2nd floor of Jose McIntyre's to ourselves. Look for us at the top of the stairs.

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Boston Volunteers Popular Party. Who else...
